actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Disability Assistance and Memorial Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Disability Assistance and Memorial Affairs

official_title: To direct the Inspector General of the Department of Veterans Affairs to submit to Congress a report on the backlog of disability compensation claims submitted to the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.
short_title: Veterans Administration Backlog Accountability Act of 2023

summary.text:
Veterans Administration Backlog Accountability Act of 2023

This bill requires the Inspector General of the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to report on the backlog of VA disability compensation claims that are pending before the Veterans Benefits Administration or the Board of Veterans' Appeals.

titles.title: Veterans Administration Backlog Accountability Act of 2023
Veterans Administration Backlog Accountability Act of 2023
To direct the Inspector General of the Department of Veterans Affairs to submit to Congress a report on the backlog of disability compensation claims submitted to the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.
